verses.verse: Who has believed<WH539> our message?<WH8052> To whom has the arm<WH2220> of Yahweh<WH3068> been revealed?<WH1540>

For he grew up<WH5927> before<WH6440> him as a tender plant,<WH3126> and as a root<WH8328> out of dry<WH6723> ground.<WH776> He has no good looks<WH8389> or majesty.<WH1926> When we see<WH7200> him,<WH4758> there is no beauty that we should desire him.<WH2530>

He was despised,<WH959> and rejected<WH2310> by men;<WH376> a man<WH376> of suffering,<WH4341> and acquainted<WH3045> with disease.<WH2483> He was despised<WH959> as<WH4564> one from whom men hide their face;<WH6440> and we didn't<WH2803> respect him.
Surely<WH403> he has borne<WH5375> our sickness,<WH2483> and carried<WH5445> our suffering;<WH4341> yet we considered<WH2803> him plagued,<WH5060> struck<WH5221> by God,<WH430> and afflicted.<WH6031>

But he was pierced<WH2490> for our transgressions.<WH6588> He was crushed<WH1792> for our iniquities.<WH5771> The punishment<WH4148> that brought our peace<WH7965> was on him;<WH2250> and by his wounds we are healed.<WH7495>
All we like sheep<WH6629> have gone astray.<WH8582> Everyone<WH376> has turned<WH6437> to his own way;<WH1870> and Yahweh<WH3068> has laid<WH6293> on him the iniquity of us all.<WH5771>

He was oppressed,<WH5065> yet when he was afflicted<WH6031> he didn't<WH6605> open his mouth.<WH6310> As a lamb<WH7716> that is led<WH2986> to the slaughter,<WH2874> and as a sheep<WH7353> that before<WH6440> its shearers<WH1494> is mute,<WH481> so he didn't<WH6605> open his mouth.<WH6310>

He was taken<WH3947> away by oppression<WH6115> and judgment;<WH4941> and as for his generation,<WH1755> who considered<WH7878> that he was cut off<WH1504> out of the land<WH776> of the living<WH2416> and stricken<WH5061> for the disobedience<WH6588> of my people?<WH5971>

They made<WH5414> his grave<WH6913> with the wicked,<WH7563> and with a rich<WH6223> man in his death;<WH4194> although he had done<WH6213> no violence,<WH2555> neither was any deceit<WH4820> in his mouth.<WH6310>

Yet it pleased<WH2654> Yahweh<WH3068> to bruise<WH1792> him.<WH2470> He has caused him to suffer. When you make<WH7760> his soul<WH5315> an offering for sin,<WH817> he shall see<WH7200> his seed.<WH2233> He shall prolong<WH748> his days,<WH3117> and the pleasure<WH2656> of Yahweh<WH3068> shall prosper<WH6743> in his hand.<WH3027>

After the suffering<WH5999> of his soul,<WH5315> he will see<WH7200> the light and be satisfied.<WH7646> My righteous<WH6662> servant<WH5650> will justify<WH6663> many<WH7227> by the knowledge<WH1847> of himself;<WH5445> and he will bear their iniquities.<WH5771>

Therefore will I divide<WH2505> him a portion with the great,<WH7227> and he shall divide<WH2505> the spoil<WH7998> with the strong;<WH6099> because he poured out<WH6168> his soul<WH5315> to death,<WH4194> and was numbered<WH4487> with the transgressors;<WH6586> yet he bore<WH5375> the sin<WH2399> of many,<WH7227> and made intercession<WH6293> for the transgressors.<WH6586>
